sentences.en: A fresh egg will sink and an old egg will float.
sentences.cn: 新鲜鸡蛋会沉下去而不新鲜的会浮在上面。

sentences.en: an ostrich egg
sentences.cn: 鸵鸟蛋

sentences.en: As the egg whites cook, they coagulate and rise to the surface.
sentences.cn: 蛋白一煮就会凝结，并且浮起来。

sentences.en: Blackbirds lay their eggs in March.
sentences.cn: 乌鸫在3月产蛋。

sentences.en: Cheese can be sprinkled on egg or vegetable dishes.
sentences.cn: 奶酪可以撒在鸡蛋或蔬菜做的菜肴上。

sentences.en: don't underestimate this team, or you'll be left with egg on your face.
sentences.cn: 不要小瞧这支队，不然你会出丑的。

sentences.en: Each female will lay just one egg in April or May.
sentences.cn: 每个雌体四五月份只产一粒卵。

sentences.en: Each recipe specifies the size of egg to be used.
sentences.cn: 每种菜谱都具体规定了所用鸡蛋的大小。

sentences.en: Fold the cream into the egg yolk mixture.
sentences.cn: 把奶油调入蛋黄液中。

sentences.en: Gently fold in the whisked egg whites.
sentences.cn: 轻轻地调入搅拌好的蛋清。

sentences.en: I've simply cut egg yolks out entirely.
sentences.cn: 我干脆彻底不吃蛋黄了。

sentences.en: If you do that, you'll end up with egg on your face.
sentences.cn: 你要是做那件事，必将以耻辱告终

sentences.en: Joe always has bacon and egg for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 乔早餐总是吃熏肉加蛋。

sentences.en: Milk, oily fish and egg all contain vitamin D.
sentences.cn: 牛奶、油性鱼类和鸡蛋都含有维生素D.

sentences.en: Most of these nourishing substances are in the yolk of the egg.
sentences.cn: 这些营养物质中的大部分在蛋黄里。

sentences.en: She was still hiccuping from the egg she had swallowed whole.
sentences.cn: 刚才一口吞下整个鸡蛋，她现在还在打嗝。

sentences.en: The egg landed on my cheek with a splat.
sentences.cn: 鸡蛋啪嚓一声打在我脸颊上。

sentences.en: The eggs hatch (= break open to allow the baby out ) in 26 days.
sentences.cn: 这些蛋要26天才能孵化。

sentences.en: The shell surrounding the egg has many important functions.
sentences.cn: 蛋壳有许多重要的功能。

sentences.en: Whisk the egg whites until stiff.
sentences.cn: 把蛋白搅打稠。

sentences.en: Whisk the egg whites until they are foamy but not stiff.
sentences.cn: 把蛋清搅至起沫而不黏稠的程度。

phrases.phrase: don't put all your eggs in one basket
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)不要孤注一掷，不要把一切希望寄托在一件事上
得零分；鸭蛋；零分（等于duck egg）
(北美，非正式)见鬼去吧（表示愤怒或鄙视）
金蛋(便于创造就业机会的场所)
讨人喜欢的人，有趣味的人
在初期，在萌芽状态，尚未发展的，未成熟的(常与crush连用)

phrases.phrase: kill the goose that lays the golden eggs

phrases.tran_cn: 储蓄金，储备金（为养老或应变等用）

phrases.phrase: put all (one's) eggs in one basket 或 have all (one's) eggs in one basket 【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 孤注一掷：将所有的一切放在一次冒险上

trans.tran_cn: 蛋，卵，禽蛋，蛋形物，卵细胞
trans.tran_en: a round object with a hard surface, that contains a baby bird, snake, insect etc and which is produced by a female bird, snake, insect etc
a round object with a hard surface, that contains a baby bird, snake, insect etc and which is produced by a female bird, snake, insect etc
to urge or incite, esp to daring or foolish acts
